fields.message: Each individual layout item is sorted into the layout based on its position - notated by the number to the left of the content - and the columns set within the Layout Settings. You can drag and drop items as needed to move them up or down in the order. If you have issues changing the order of items, click on the collapse icon in the top left of the layout item.

sub_fields.message: Click the settings cog in the top right of this component to customize the wrapper options.
Closes the wrapper component. All options are configurable inside the starting component.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Size
sub_fields.name: featured_image_size
sub_fields.instructions: Image sizes here are based on what's available within WordPress. Sizes are set inside Settings > Media.

sub_fields.label: Image Links to Post
